testcase.name: Register User
testcase.system-out:
Given I am able to naviagte to Homepage.....................................passed When I click on Sign up.....................................................passed Then Registration Screen Opens..............................................passed Then I Select what do you want to do........................................passed And I Enter First Name "Niha"...............................................passed And I Enter Last Name "Raj".................................................passed And I Enter e-mail "niharaj@xyz.com"........................................passed And I Enter Username "niharaj"..............................................passed And I Enter Pass "Welcome123"...............................................passed And I Enter Confirm Password "Welcome123"...................................passed And I Click Register........................................................passed Then I should see "Dear Niha Raj,
Your personal settings have been registered.".passed Then I click on profile.....................................................passed And I Validate e-mail "niharaj@xyz.com".....................................passed Then I navigate to homepage.................................................passed Then I click on compose.....................................................passed Then I should see compose message...........................................passed Then I enter toemail "pk123@gmail.com"......................................passed Then I enter subject "Testmail".............................................passed Then I enter content "Hi, /n This is for Testing"...........................passed Then I click on send........................................................passed Then I should see The message has been sent "The message has been sent to Pavan Kumar (pavankumar)".passed
